main event: On November 20, 1966, an unidentified object was observed in Trotwood, Ohio by multiple witnesses who reported seeing a luminous object that appeared to move rapidly and then ascend.
interesting points: The object was described as flat disc-shaped and very bright white., Observers noted the object appeared to stand still at times., One witness reported seeing small lights in the center of the object., The object moved at a very fast pace and disappeared by drifting up into the sky., Observers thought it might be an aircraft but noted the unusual characteristics of the sighting.
witness description: two male observers, one of whom was in the vicinity of a building and viewed the object in the sky.
